caption:
Table 1. Comparisons with state-of-the-art TAL methods on THUMOS'14 dataset. The mAP values at different IoU thresholds are reported. 
The AVG column shows the averaged mAP under the thresholds [0.1:0.7:0.1]. UNT is the abbreviation for UntrimmedNet feature.

Table 2. Comparison results on ActivityNet v1.2 dataset. The 
AVG column shows the averaged mAP under the thresholds 
[0.5:0.95:0.05]. UNT and I3D are abbreviations for Untrimmed-
Net feature and I3D feature, respectively.
